body_html:
I added support for filenames as well as file-likes like io.BytesIO in torch.jit.load and torch.jit.save. Let me know if the API looks better now.
That one test on Windows will still probably fail, that's next in line.
body_text:
I added support for filenames as well as file-likes like io.BytesIO in torch.jit.load and torch.jit.save. Let me know if the API looks better now.
That one test on Windows will still probably fail, that's next in line.
body:
I added support for filenames as well as file-likes like `io.BytesIO` in `torch.jit.load` and `torch.jit.save`. Let me know if the API looks better now.
That one test on Windows will still probably fail, that's next in line.
